ygData.msgSnippet: Okay guys, first of all, I am partly in agreement with LN about this poll. It is an inane poll, and I wouldnt even vote on it to see the results. First of all,

From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Okay guys, first of all, I am partly in agreement with LN about this
poll. It is an inane poll, and I wouldnt even vote on it to see the
results. First of all, it is demeaning to whoever may lose even though
it means Jack SHIT. The truth of the matter is that the poll you created
is a relative question. RPGing is the same thing as anything else, "to
each his own". Some people will like my long discriptive posts, while
others will find it boring and a waste of time. Others will like posts
that are short and sweet, to the point, while the rest will feel they
have no substance. It really dosent matter. Also, this rpg is only as
good as it's worse player, so we are all affected by a bad post,
therefor should all be striving to get better. Tankor, please stop
making these dumb polls, somebodies feelings might get hurt if people
actually vote, and I find it mosly insulting that you would even waste
your time to write the stupid thing, which serves no purpose but to
belittle others.
